result.title: Whats wrong with this solution!
result.content:
In the Codecraft-17 and Codeforces Round #391 (Div. 1 + Div. 2, combined) there is a problem Gotta Catch Em' All! I wrote a solution for it and it says wrong answer on Test 13, although i find nothing wrong. Can anyone please point out the mistake?

include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std; int main() { int i=-1,B=0,u=0,l=0,b=0,a=0,s=0,r=0; string input; cin>>input; int j=input.size(); while(i<=j) { i++; if(input[i]=='B') B++; else if(input[i]=='u') u++; else if(input[i]=='l') l++; else if(input[i]=='b') b++; else if(input[i]=='a') a++; else if(input[i]=='s') s++; else if(input[i]=='r') r++; } i=0; while(B>0) { if(u>=(2*B) && l>=B && b>=(2*B) && a>=(2*B) && s>=B && r>=B) { cout<<B<<endl; break; } else B--; } if(B==0) cout<<B<<endl; return 0; }
